SongName: lay me in the reservoir (n,n. x ʎpoqou)
Lyric:
[by:蜥蜴沼质]
[ti:lay me in the reservoir (n,n. x poqou)]
[ar:nothing,nowhere.]
[al:the nothing,nowhere. lp]
[00:01.16]"Looking at young people involved in the occult
[00:05.15]Do you see any particular type of dress?" 
[00:08.30]"I have personally observed people wearing black fingernails
[00:13.74]Having their hair painted black, wearing black t-shirts
[00:18.94]Sometimes they will tattoo themselves." 
[00:24.99]"Do you have an opinion as to whether or not
[00:27.65]There are occult overtones or elements of occult involvement in these particular markers?"
[00:36.50]Sleeping in on Saturdays
[00:40.69]I hang my head, I'm full of hate
[00:44.88]And you can die in many ways
[00:49.48]So lay me on the interstate
[00:53.73]Told you once, I'll say again
[00:58.08]My body's burned, I'm shivering
[01:02.42]Won't make amends, don't need a friend
[01:07.05]My blood is black, I'm fucking spent
[01:10.52]"Usually the younger the individual the more pure it is
[01:15.99]The more powerful, the more force it has
[01:19.78]A lot of times they will take blood and store it for other services and other use"
[01:33.24]I fell away, please stay away
[01:41.83]It's all in my head, can't leave my bed
[01:50.37]I'm sleeping all day, wasting away
[01:59.25]So throw me in the reservoir
[02:03.09]
[03:17.87]"How were you accepted into involvement at Columbian Pacific universities?"
[03:23.28] "I had to fill out surveys of papers including all my education and background experience."
